entry.title: KotlinGeekDev/Nosky
entry.summary:
A native Android client for Nostr

Nosky

A native Android client for Nostr. For more about Nostr, see here

Building an optimized APK file, if you have Android Studio(optional)

To build an optimized APK file, please go to Build > Select build variant, then select 'release' in the Build Variants window that opens.

Credits

Vector icons created by Smashicons - Flaticon
